metadata.title: SpectraIntelligence-EnrichNetworkEntities
metadata.description: This playbook will enrich a Microsoft Sentinel Incident with information about network entities (IP addresses, URLs, and domain names) from ReversingLabs Spectra Intelligence (formerly TitaniumCloud). A comment will be added to the incident with details about the entity.
prerequisites: ReversingLabs Spectra Intelligence username and password

metadata.description: Name of the playbook (Logic Apps resources) which will be created

inputs.name: url comment
inputs.value:
@{concat(substring(item()?['Url'], 0, indexOf(item()?['Url'], '.')),'[.]',substring(item()?['Url'], add(indexOf(item()?['Url'], '.'), 1), sub(length(item()?['Url']), add(indexOf(item()?['Url'], '.'), 1))))}@{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['classification']}@{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['reason']}malicious: @{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['malicious']}
undetected: @{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['undetected']}
clean: @{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['clean']}
total: @{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['total']}@{outputs('Dedupe_categories')}@{body('Get_the_URL_report')?['rl']?['last_seen']}

inputs.name: domain comment
inputs.value:
@{replace(item()?['DomainName'], '.', '[.]')}malicious: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['malicious']}
undetected: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['undetected']}
clean: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['clean']}
total: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['total']}malicious: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['malicious']}
unknown: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['unknown']}
suspicious: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['suspicious']}
known: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['known']}
total: @{body('Get_the_domain_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['total']}

inputs.name: ip comment
inputs.value:
@{item()?['Address']}malicious: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['malicious']}
undetected: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['undetected']}
clean: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['clean']}
total: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['third_party_reputations']?['statistics']['total']}malicious: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['malicious']}
unknown: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['unknown']}
suspicious: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['suspicious']}
known: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['known']}
total: @{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['downloaded_files_statistics']['total']}@{outputs('Dedupe_IP_categories')}@{body('Get_the_IP_address_report')?['rl']?['last_seen']}
